arStrings.szText: After casting a {c_important}Companion{/c} Skill, your next {c_important}Core{/c} or {c_important}Wrath{/c} Skill's damage and Critical Strike Chance are increased by {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|%x|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_2}|%x|]{/c}.
Your next Core or Wrath Skill has increased damage and Critical Strike Chance.
